casebody.data:
[Cite as 08/29/2003 Case Announcements, 2003-Ohio-4579.]

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS AND ADMINISTRATIVE ACTIONS

August 29, 2003

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2000-1420. Boggs v. Moovies, Inc.

Mahoning App. No. 98CA155. This cause is pending before the court as a discretionary appeal. On October 5, 2000, this court stayed further proceedings in this ease and ordered appellants to file a notice with this court upon the termination of the automatic stay under the Bankruptcy Code.

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that appellants file a notice advising the court of the status of the bankruptcy case, within 15 days of the date of this entry.
